original_text: The deep hole of death always wants more dead people to fill it. In the same way, a person wants to have everything that he sees. The deep hole of death always wants more dead people to fill it.
korean_text: 스올과 아바돈은 만족함이 없고 사람의 눈도 만족함이 없느니라

sentences.original_text: The deep hole of death always wants
more dead people to fill it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 채울 더 많은 죽은 사람들을

sentences.original_text: a person wants to have everything
The deep hole of death always wants
more dead people to fill it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 채울 더 많은 죽은 사람들을
